But i am asking for a second chance.If this gets denied that would be fine by me what i did wasn't ok and i deserved that ban.I believe that i deserve a second chance to prove myself worth and up to the standards of the oceanic community again. Once again I am truly sorry for my words and actions.Hope you all are having a wonderful day goodbye!

replies.body:
Unfortunately bans are not undone unless they are in error. Presuming this is a permaban, there is no chance of getting your account back, because like you said your behavior here wasn't acceptable.

 If you would like you can always[ discuss your case with a support agent](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), although from what this log shows the ban wasn't in error and player support won't budge. 

Good thing is that you have come to accept your actions and you can play on one of your other accounts and hopefully not run into trouble.
Ah So there is no possible way for it to get un-banned? the name of the account is semi valuable to me.
You can ask support to change the name of the account so you can claim it on a new account, not sure what their policy on that sort of thing would be or if they'd do it but no harm in asking.
nope, you may be able to request that name again but I highly doubt it. You cant get the account back
